name: The cult of ice and fire
name_original: The cult of ice and fire
description:
Controls:

Use Arrow keys or WASD to move around, use mouse to click buttons.

Theme:

Duality is included in the story of the game by using enemies that use the powers of ice and fire.

The mechanics integrate the theme by having skills that allow you to trade off attack for defence, or attack for damage, or something similar.

Credits:

Graphics are eathier heavily influenced or shamelessly based on the works of:

Anokolisa , ANSIMUZ , szadi art , Thalzon

Music was taken from:

Survival Horror Music Mega Pack (C) by Joel Steudler
